p: Finally, we detected one single synonymous substitution in the HA signal peptide region of each subtype; T30C: Y10Y in one A(H1N1)pdm09 isolate and T18C: A6A in one A(H3N2) isolate ( S2 and S4 Tables). Although none of these synonymous substitutions were addressed in the literature, in vitro experiments in a recent study revealed that synonymous mutations at the beginning of the HA gene may affect viral fitness [ 48].
